summary: HERE IS ANOTHER TESLA IN THE JUNKYARD.  THE FRONT SUSPENSION HAS COLLAPSED ON BOTH SIDES.  IT DOES NOT APPEAR THAT THE CAR HAS BEEN INVOLVED IN A COLLISION WITH ANOTHER VEHICLE.  THE DAMAGE LOOKS TO BE ENTIRELY SELF INFLICTED DUE TO THE SUSPENSION FAILURE.  IT IS OBVIOUS THAT TESLA HAS A CULTURE THAT REFUSES TO RECOGNISE THESE REPEATED SUSPENSION FAILURES AND BY THEIR USE OF NON DISCLOSURE AGREEMENTS DISCOURAGES OWNERS FROM REPORTING TO THE AUTHORITIES.  I BELIEVE IT IS LONG OVERDUE FOR NHTSA TO INVESTIGATE THESE MATTERS.   THANK YOU.  CONCERNED CITIZEN.    DATE OF INCIDENT IS AN APPROXIMATION.
